tswitem.name: Vitalising Augment Resonator
tswitem.tooltip:
Vitalising Augment Resonator
An unattuned healing augment.
Resonating this augment to an active ability will increase your critical heal chance by 2%/ 4%/ 6%/ 8%/ 10% for this ability.
To attune this augment, place it in the assembly window with:
  • 3 Attuned Mending Augment Resonators
  • 48 Pure denkyem runes
  • 48 Pure dust
